job.title: Senior DevOps Engineer
job.description:
Our CONFIDENTIAL, growth client is looking for experienced DevOps and Site Reliability Engineers who are interested in working with a fast-growing team in building industry-leading real estate data services. You will be working on a small team using cutting edge technology and tools to build and support infrastructure for our diverse environment including customer facing applications, large scale data processing, and APIs.


Technologies:

  • Google Cloud (Compute, Storage, Networking)
  • Kubernetes
  • Helm
  • Terraform
  • CircleCI
  • Monitoring (DataDog or Stackdriver, StatusCake)
  • Linux
  • Bash
  • Python


Application/Data Stack

  • Airflow
  • Hasura
  • ETL processes
  • Database Development and support (Postgres, BigQuery, MongoDB)
  • GraphQL
  • Looker
  • Node.js,
  • React/Redux
  • Python


If you can articulate the value of CI/CD and Infrastructure-as-code (IAC) and have hands-on coding experience with infrastructure management automation in the cloud (GCP OR AWS), would look forward to reviewing your background.


Once you apply, we’ll send you the full job spec, all company information and a highlight of their leadership team.
